channel.title: Personal on Tedsig42
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Tedsig42
channel.item:
Whoami http://localhost:1313/about/ Fri, 08 Aug 2025 01:19:25 +0200 http://localhost:1313/about/ <<<<<<< HEAD

I’m Ted “Tedsig42” Regis Kouhouenou, a young Cybersecurity Enthusiast, CTF player, music lover, artist, 22 yo.
I spend much of my time at schools like 42 School, Epitech, Holberton School. I spend my free time on Web Security Research, and recently started Bug Bounty.
From time to time, I contribute to certain open source projects such as Exegol, The Hacker Recipes and Payload all the things.
I play CTF and collaborate with the @TheBugsReapers Vulnerability Researcher / Bug Hunter team.
I strive to provide as much information as I can about what I have learned on my blog tedsig42.re, which encompasses CTF writeups, research projects, and more.
My Youtube Channel
Currently self-employed, but open to new opportunities.
